info.description:
### Prerequisites

- Postman
- IBM Cloud Account: [https://dataplatform.cloud.ibm.com/login](https://dataplatform.cloud.ibm.com/login)
    

### Usage

1. Create a fork
2. Update collection variables
3. Send requests
    

### Documentation

- API: [https://cloud.ibm.com/apidocs/machine-learning](https://cloud.ibm.com/apidocs/machine-learning)
- Models: [https://www.ibm.com/products/watsonx-ai/foundation-models](https://www.ibm.com/products/watsonx-ai/foundation-models)

response.name: OK
